body:
Comment 3: 
I can't find Make.pkg mentioned in cgo's godoc.
Perhaps you were looking at golang.org instead of
weekly.golang.org or tip.golang.org.

The swig and cgo files do exist, as reminders that
we haven't quite built enough to replace them on
all systems yet (cgo is waiting on Windows; swig
is waiting on all systems).

The cgo stuff will happen before Go 1 and is tracked
separately.  The swig stuff will probably have to wait
until after.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-go1**, **go1-must**, **documentation**._
